segments.text: Good afternoon . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon . My name is Monica . I am here for the job interview at 2 PM .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , please first fill in the form and return it to me . You can do it in the next door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everybody attention . I would like to make sure you all know the process . The interview consists of three parts . One , all of the interviewees will answer the question there and lasts for maximum one hour . Two , we will take a 30 - minute â€™ s break . After the break , we all come back to this office and I will announce the successful candidates for the 2nd round . In which , you have a small interview with your future manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good question . But I will tell you when you pass the first two .
segments.speaker: S1
